statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ -8 \\ -8 \\ 11 \\ 17 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -2 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 19 \\ -23 \\ -20 \\ 33 \\ 43 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
